algorithm_technique: Iterate through strings, check if numeric, convert or use length, find maximum
problem_summary_simple: Find the maximum value of strings in an array, where value is numeric if all digits, else string length.
problem_summary_technical: Iterate through the array, determine string value (numeric or length), and track the maximum encountered value.
key_insights: The core logic is to distinguish between purely numeric strings and alphanumeric strings.
For numeric strings, direct conversion to integer gives the value.
For alphanumeric strings, the length of the string determines its value.
